text: Nia paana lodo geinga mono dama siibi ga miamiami i di gowaa e dahi, gei nia manu laion ga miami e gai tagangudu o nia kau. Nia gihaa ga hagalee hagamadagudagu dangada labelaa. Deai di mee huaidu be di mee e hagahuaidu i hongo dogu gonduu haga madagu ge dabuaahia go Zion ai.” Aanei la nnelekai mai baahi Dimaadua.65.25 Isaiah 11.6-9
